tweets.text:
@PhilFarmVet @sunkfarmer @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency You said: "..without long term and persistent action..."

I have read the thread. I am now asking you what your suggestions are for long term and persistent action.

Calling all young people... share you thoughts on water management with @OBrightFuture @WildlifeTrusts and @EnvAgency please pass on to those interested in making a change for the better @carbonlands @myplace2gr0w @emma_ymp @Linc2Wigan @SalfordYC @salfordyouth1 @gmyn @GMGreenCity https://t.co/ERiEc6ljul

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

tweets.text: @Drystonesonnet @sunkfarmer @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency Please read the thread as a thread. Jono's suggestion was not to build on flood plains. All I was saying is that the levels are and always will be mainly flood plains and not building on them isn't an option. They need to be managed.
@PhilFarmVet @sunkfarmer @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @agricontract @EnvAgency So what do you propose?

@sunkfarmer @westyeo @pastoralview @wheat_daddy @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency That's my point, I spent the first 25 years of my life there - without long term and persistent action, the land will persistently flood.

Accompanied by the usual BS statements from the @EnvAgency "We do allow storm overflows to discharge exceptionally into chalk streams".

Last time I checked, which was last week, TW had been dumping sewage into the River Chess for the 6th day in a row. Exceptional? https://t.co/N2khh8uHfr

...and THANKS for that support...

Agencies working together to protect homes and businesses...

PLEASE don’t take your daily exercise along the river bank today. We've had a number of reports of people walking and running through flood water. Please stay away from river edges. Its very dangerous as you can't see the bank and the river is flowing very fast #FloodAware https://t.co/fNDVCCLj4T

urls.title: Successful first year for waste crime taskforce despite pandemic
urls.description: The Joint Unit for Waste Crime celebrates its first anniversary of cracking down on criminals and gangs who commit serious and organised waste crime.

tweets.text:
#WasteCrime harms our environment, community and economy.
 
We joined forces with partners to form the Joint Unit for Waste Crime, to share intelligence and work in innovative ways to disrupt waste criminals. 
 
Here's what we've achieved after 1 year 👇
https://t.co/sYwoOeE6Xu https://t.co/1xEw3TwkRU
@pastoralview @wheat_daddy @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo Well said. Whoever decides its the right thing to build on flood plains doesn't have a brain.

✅ Waterside #Evesham reopen following earlier closure due to flooding

@worcscc @Wychavon @EnvAgencyMids

Soap suds flowing over the sewage fungus adjacent to the septic tank/trickle filter outfall pipe onto surface of a public area. @EnvAgency what are you doing about this pollution? General binding rules? https://t.co/oXzlVqDA1f
@limehousepod @EnvAgency When it comes to the @EnvAgency and the water industry I might dispute that but I'd be delighted to learn if you can point me towards it.

urls.title: Thames Water discharging raw sewage into Buckinghamshire river
urls.description: River Chess Association say untreated sewage is causing untold harm to infant trout and other habitats

tweets.text:
Mildly encouraged by @thameswater comments over its disgraceful frequent discharges of untreated sewage into the beautiful River Chess. 
Unacceptable, and tolerated for too long. 
Enough words: now let's see some £££ action! 
@EnvAgencySE @Feargal_Sharkey 
https://t.co/FvP0SJaQnZ

entity.description: Traditional tabletop games like poker, chess, and mahjong.

tweets.text: Good to see the article, there are a number of things that need to be corrected, as good as the picture is that is runoff not sewage, the @EnvAgency "allow" permitted & un-permitted sewage discharges into the @RiverChess & these groundwater ingress discharges are un-permitted. https://t.co/5KDG5ALPjP
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency I’m sure they’ll be some accountability.....we live in an age of it
